activities: Personal information received from the EU may be used to create accounts, conduct and notify users about reward programs, contests, sweepstakes, events and promotions; to provide customer support; to conduct polls, surveys, or questionnaires; to notify users about special events and company and product information; for our business purposes, including record-keeping, transaction fulfillment, and marketing; and to track and report users' participation in tournaments and competitions with our products.  Personal information may also be shared with third party partners provided the consumer has opted into the sharing of such information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Toy & Games - (TOY)Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)Books & Periodicals - (BOK)
privacyprograms: Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Privacy Online Program
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism through the Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Online Privacy Program.
